name: Legend Of The Coin Knight
description: An Action/Adventure, Rpg video game, with a lighthearted journey that contains major plot twists, leading to an epic adventure.  You will play the role of a simple Coin Hounder that enjoys what he does.  The son of a master treasure hunter, you are Collin Hatchwork living on sunny Palm Tree Island.  Getting ready for the next adventure.  You are sure to find gold, intriguing puzzles, beautiful woman, Seas to sail, weapons to master, and challenging combat.  Defeat the dark wizard lord Manatos Mynos and his generals, before he summons the Great Magic God and destroys all of Korhana!
